name: Rock-And-Roll Adventure
description:
My not-so-final project.

Using everything I've learned this last year in Unity, Rock-And-Roll Adventure is my biggest 3D platformer yet. Roll around 40 unique levels, explore for hidden collectibles, and defeat all of the robotic bosses.

There are also a lot of side modes, including a Boss Rush, Multiplayer Battle Mode, 3 unique minigames, and 20 Marble Mazes to solve.

With a massive story mode and boatloads of content, Rock-And-Roll Adventure should have something for everyone!

Made possible thanks to the Bronx Science Game Programming class.
